remarks: Compute the coefficient function given a sum expression for the polynomial.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dgrle.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
dgrle.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dgrle.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dgrle.4 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( A x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
coeeq2 $p |- ( ph -> ( coeff ` F ) = ( k e. NN0 |-> if ( k <_ N , A , 0 ) ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d N k z $.
$d k ph z $.
